com.marcospassos.phpserializer

Class SerializerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcospassos.phpserializer.SerializerBuilder

  • public class SerializerBuilder
extends Object
    Provides a friendly API for creating instances of Serializer.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Passos

      Creates a builder with the specified factory.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public Serializer build()
        Creates a Serializer instance based on the current configuration. This method is free of side-effects to this GsonBuilder instance and hence can be called multiple times.
        Returns:
        An instance of Serializer configured with the options currently set in this builder.

      • setNamingStrategy

        public SerializerBuilder setNamingStrategy(NamingStrategy strategy)
        Configures the serializer to apply a specific naming policy strategy to an objects during serialization.
        Parameters:
        strategy - The naming strategy to apply to objects.
        Returns:
        The current builder.

      • addExclusionStrategy

        public SerializerBuilder addExclusionStrategy(FieldExclusionStrategy strategy)
        Configures the serializer to apply the specified in exclusion strategy during serialization. If this method is invoked numerous times with different exclusion strategy objects then the exclusion strategies that were added will be applied as a disjunction rule. This means that if one of the added exclusion strategies suggests that a field (or class) should be skipped then that field (or object) is skipped during its deserialization.
        Parameters:
        strategy - The exclusion strategy.
        Returns:
        The current builder.

      • registerAdapter

        public SerializerBuilder registerAdapter(Class type,
                                         TypeAdapter adapter)
        Registers the provided adapter for the specified type. This registers the type specified and all subclasses. For example, an adapter registered for Number.class will be also applied to Integer.class. If a type adapter was previously registered for the specified type, it is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        type - The base class or interface supported by the adapter.
        adapter - The type adapter.
        Returns:
        The current builder.

      • registerBuiltinAdapters

        public SerializerBuilder registerBuiltinAdapters()
        Registers all builtin adapters.
        Returns:
        The current builder.
